name: part_007
file: tmp_【 #さくらみこ3D新衣装 】ゲストあり！3D新衣装お披露目LIVE ⧸ New outfit LIVE【ホロライブ⧸さくらみこ】 [jYQdvWQ20O0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Sakura Miko performs 'Hakushu Kassai Utaawase' by ryo (Supercell) in her new 3D outfit.
Sakura Miko performs 'Maware! Setsugetsuka' from Unbreakable Machine-Doll.

subtitles.original:
拍手喝采歌合
作詞・作曲：ryo
subtitles.english:
Applause & Cheers Song-Off
Lyrics/Composition: ryo

subtitles.original: あー、浅き夢見し　うたたねの中で
subtitles.english: Ah, in the midst of a shallow dream, while dozing...

subtitles.original: 人の定めは　かくも儚きもの
subtitles.english: The fate of man is such a fragile thing.

subtitles.original: 己が望んだならずばな
subtitles.english: If I myself am a rogue flower...

subtitles.original: 相容れぬは許すまじ
subtitles.english: Being incompatible is unforgivable.

subtitles.original: この世は泡沫
subtitles.english: This world is transient bubbles,

subtitles.original: 流るるままに
subtitles.english: flowing as it will.

subtitles.original: 十余り二つ　酔いもせず
subtitles.english: Ten and two, without getting drunk,

subtitles.original: 見るは夢か　幻か
subtitles.english: what I see is it a dream or an illusion?

subtitles.original: 重ねても叶わぬまでは
subtitles.english: Until it no longer comes true no matter how often repeated,

subtitles.original: ただ弱く　あだ美し
subtitles.english: it's just weak and transiently beautiful.

subtitles.original: 仇桜　夜明けに散る　灯し火　ずっと
subtitles.english: Transient cherry blossoms, falling at dawn, a light forever...

subtitles.original: 勝つも負けるも　時の運ならば
subtitles.english: If winning or losing is all down to luck,

subtitles.original: 覚悟を決めて　いざ推して参れ
subtitles.english: prepare yourself, and let us advance!

subtitles.original: 人は流れて　どこへ行く
subtitles.english: People flow on, where do they go?

subtitles.original: 涙流れて　どこへ行く
subtitles.english: Tears flow on, where do they go?

subtitles.original: 君を悲しと　思っても
subtitles.english: Even if I think of you as sorrowful,

subtitles.original: 今日を限りと　決めた祈りよ
subtitles.english: it's a prayer that has decided today is the limit!

subtitles.original: 散るは花　恋い心
subtitles.english: Falling are the flowers, the longing heart,

subtitles.original: 叶わぬなら　いっそこの世は泡沫
subtitles.english: if it won't come true, then this world is better as foam,

subtitles.original: 流るるままに
subtitles.english: flowing as it will.

subtitles.original: 十余り二つ　狂いもせず
subtitles.english: Ten and two, without going mad,

subtitles.original: 見るは鬼か　人の子か
subtitles.english: what I see is it a demon or a child of man?

subtitles.original: 重ねても食えても
subtitles.english: Even if repeated, even if consumed,

subtitles.original: 手放さぬ　仇なし世
subtitles.english: I won't let go of this transient world.

subtitles.original: 仇の縁　雨の月さえ　ほら
subtitles.english: Transient ties, look, even the moon in the rain...

subtitles.original: あー、浅き夢見し　うたたねの中で
subtitles.english: Ah, in the midst of a shallow dream, while dozing...

subtitles.original: 人の定めは
subtitles.english: The fate of man is...

subtitles.original: かくも儚きもの
subtitles.english: ...such a fragile thing.

subtitles.original:
回レ！雪月花
作詞・作曲：ヒゲドライバー
subtitles.english:
Spin! Snow, Moon, and Flowers
Lyrics/Composition: Hige Driver

subtitles.original: ほい！
subtitles.english: Hoi!

subtitles.original: いいよ！
subtitles.english: Nice!

subtitles.original: ぱん！
subtitles.english: Pan!

subtitles.original: これよりご覧いただきますのは　か弱き者たちの永点ずる
subtitles.english: What you are about to see is the eternal dance of the weak.

subtitles.original: 時代は常に進月歩　老若男女
subtitles.english: The times are always evolving, regardless of age or gender.

subtitles.original: 意見は完全懲悪　悪者の類　それそれ
subtitles.english: Opinion is the punishment of evil, those villains, there there.

subtitles.original: 何でも本に振るだけで楽しいの
subtitles.english: Anything is fun just by flipping through the book.

subtitles.original: どんなってこんな公問答
subtitles.english: What kind of public debate is this?

subtitles.original: ぱん！
subtitles.english: Pan!

subtitles.original: どこからともなく現れ出てくる　とか言っちゃって心酔
subtitles.english: Appearing out of nowhere, or so I say, fascinated.

subtitles.original: チャンスを待ったら一日千秋　追い越せれば途法精査
subtitles.english: Waiting for a chance feels like an eternity, if I can overtake, it's a careful search.

subtitles.original: 時代は常に変幻万化　人の心を和え返しても
subtitles.english: Times are always changing, even if you try to blend human hearts.

subtitles.original: 本気でそんなこと言ってんの？
subtitles.english: Are you seriously saying that?

subtitles.original: 戻りももし子
subtitles.english: Even coming back...

subtitles.original: あー、巡り巡って夜の街
subtitles.english: Ah, going round and round through the night streets.

subtitles.original: 君は愛づらし　天出す雨も
subtitles.english: You are beloved, even the rain falling from the sky.

subtitles.original: はー！回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ！
subtitles.english: Ha! Spin spin spin spin spin spin spin spin spin!

subtitles.original: 華麗に雅に散るように
subtitles.english: Like falling elegantly and gracefully.

subtitles.original: 回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ回レ！
subtitles.english: Spin spin spin spin spin spin spin spin spin!

subtitles.original: 髪も振り乱して
subtitles.english: With hair flying wildly.

subtitles.original: お祭り　昨日今日と明日と明後日と
subtitles.english: The festival—yesterday, today, tomorrow, and the day after,

subtitles.original: この宴は続く
subtitles.english: this feast continues.

subtitles.original: 踊れ歌え一心不乱に回レ
subtitles.english: Dance and sing, spin with all your might,

subtitles.original: 今宵は雪月花！
subtitles.english: tonight is the Snow, Moon, and Flowers!
